metadata.title: Appverse Web
metadata.subtitle: Rich Internet Application Development Stack
metadata.description: Appverse Web is a multi-faceted full-stack framework that incorporates best-of-breed open source frontend and backend technologies. Developers can leverage cutting-edge HTML5 possibilities and still meet the challenges of secure and robust server-side service development, integration, and delivery.

metadata.title: Appverse Mobile
metadata.subtitle: Multi-Platform Mobile App Development
metadata.description: The multi-platform mobile development framework enables developers to use HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3 and to leverage native mobile functionalities to build apps from a common codebase. All major mobile platforms are supported
